item.title: CVE-2021-25962|2024-09-17T02:11:12.333Z -- shuup -- shuup
item.description: “Shuup” application in versions 0.4.2 to 2.10.8 is affected by the “Formula Injection” vulnerability. A customer can inject payloads in the name input field in the billing address while buying a product. When a store administrator accesses the reports page to export the data as an Excel file and opens it, the payload gets executed.
